meaning: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ التَّوَّابِينَ وَاجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِينَ
transliteration: Allahumma aj‘alni mina at-tawwabeen waj‘alni minal-mutatahhireen
meaning: O Allah, make me among those who constantly repent and purify themselves.
My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from worry and grief.
O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being.
O Allah, guide me and keep me steadfast.
O Allah, I ask You for Your pleasure and Paradise.

arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا
transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba‘da idh hadaytana
meaning: Our Lord, do not let our hearts deviate after You have guided us.
O Allah, bless me in my provision.
O Allah, keep my heart firm upon Your religion.
My Lord, forgive me and my parents.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ زَوَالِ نِعْمَتِكَ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika min zawali ni‘matik
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the loss of Your blessings.
My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبِّ أَعِنِّي وَلَا تُعِنْ عَلَيَّ
transliteration: Allahumma rabbi a‘inni wa la tu‘in ‘alayya
meaning: O Allah, my Lord, help me and do not help against me.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ جَهْدِ الْبَلَاءِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika min jahdil-bala’
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the severity of trials.
O Allah, I ask You for success and correctness.

arabic: رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَا أَنْزَلْتَ إِلَيَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
transliteration: Rabbi inni lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqeer
meaning: My Lord, I am truly in need of whatever good You send down to me.
O Allah, I ask You for a good ending.
Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, so forgive us.
O Allah, make me better than what they think of me.

arabic: رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِي فَرْدًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ الْوَارِثِينَ
transliteration: Rabbi la tadharni fardan wa anta khayru al-waritheen
meaning: My Lord, do not leave me alone, and You are the best of inheritors.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْكَسَلِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika minal-hammi wal-kasal
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and laziness.
O Allah, I ask You for a sound heart.
O Allah, I ask You for Your love.
My Lord, make me among the righteous.

arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika min ghalabatid-dayn
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from being overpowered by debt.
O Allah, make me a guide and one who is guided.
O Allah, make me greatly thankful to You.
O Allah, make me among the people of the Qur’an.
O Allah, allow us to reach Ramadan.
